original_text: My friends, I want you to know this. The trouble that has happened to me has helped more people to know about God's good news.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 당한 일이 도리어 복음 전파에 진전이 된 줄을 너희가 알기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I want you to know this
The trouble that has happened to me
to know about God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 좋은 소식을 알게 하려는 것이다
